title: A Day on the Daly
creator_credit: Ausventure Wilderness Association and Michael Dillon Film Enterprises
brief_description: Follows a group on a trip down the Daly River, Northern Territory, in boats that were homebuilt from packing cases. Tranquil scenes and beautiful footage. No narration.
creator_credit_for_label: Ausventure Wilderness Association and Michael Dillon Film Enterprises
